fields.title: League of Legends
fields.summary: League of Legends (LoL), commonly referred to as League, is a multiplayer online battle arena video game developed and published by Riot Games. Inspired by Defense of the Ancients, a custom map for Warcraft III, Riot's founders sought to develop a stand-alone game in the same genre. Since its release in October 2009, League has been free-to-play and is monetized through purchasable character customization. The game is available for Windows and macOS.

fields.title: GTA
fields.summary: Grand Theft Auto (GTA) is an action-adventure video game series created by David Jones and Mike Dailly.[2] Later titles were developed under the oversight of brothers Dan and Sam Houser, Leslie Benzies and Aaron Garbut.

fields.title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III
fields.summary: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III brings a cinematic and explosive continuation of the beloved franchise. The game features a gripping campaign that pushes players into intense military scenarios, global conflicts, and high-stakes infiltration missions. Multiplayer has been enhanced with faster matchmaking, more balanced weapons, and deep customization options. The new Zombies mode introduces an open-world structure, blending survival and narrative progression like never before. Whether you're a solo operative or teaming up online, Modern Warfare III keeps adrenaline pumping with every round.

fields.title: Elden Ring: Rise of the Tarnished
fields.summary: Elden Ring redefines what it means to explore an open-world RPG. Set in the sprawling Lands Between, players become the Tarnished, venturing through hauntingly beautiful landscapes, ancient ruins, and vast dungeons. The game rewards curiosity, courage, and experimentation, offering freedom in combat and storytelling. From horseback battles to cryptic NPC quests, every moment in Elden Ring feels earned. The collaboration between George R. R. Martin and Hidetaka Miyazaki breathes life into a dark fantasy realm filled with lore, mystery, and countless secrets. Prepare to die � and love every second of it.

fields.title: Minecraft: A World of Infinite Imagination
fields.summary: Minecraft isn�t just a game � it�s a phenomenon. With its blocky visuals and open-ended mechanics, it offers a platform where players of all ages can build, survive, explore, and create. Whether you�re constructing megastructures in Creative Mode, adventuring in Survival, or diving into user-generated servers with complex economies and mini-games, Minecraft fosters creativity and community. Its modding scene continues to expand what�s possible, while updates bring new biomes, mobs, and mechanics. From education to entertainment, Minecraft stands as a timeless sandbox of endless possibilities.

fields.title: Cyberpunk 2077: The Rise, Fall, and Revival
fields.summary: Cyberpunk 2077 immerses players in Night City � a neon-lit dystopia where megacorporations rule and cyber-enhanced mercenaries fight for survival. As V, a customizable protagonist, you explore branching storylines, high-tech upgrades, and morally gray choices that shape the world. After a rocky launch, massive updates have polished the experience, revealing the deep RPG mechanics and philosophical underpinnings beneath the surface. With compelling characters like Johnny Silverhand, richly layered environments, and a stunning soundtrack, Cyberpunk 2077 has become a cautionary yet unforgettable sci-fi epic.

fields.title: Clash of Clans: Strategy, Loyalty, and War
fields.summary: Clash of Clans is a legendary mobile strategy game where players build villages, raise powerful armies, and wage epic wars. Starting with a small town hall, you expand into a fortified kingdom by collecting resources, upgrading defenses, and unlocking elite troops like dragons, PEKKAs, and siege machines. The game thrives on teamwork � through clan wars, donations, and real-time strategy planning. With seasonal events, hero skins, builder base battles, and clan capital raids, Clash of Clans continues to evolve over a decade since its launch. It�s not just about attacking � it�s about loyalty, timing, and smart base design. Whether you�re a casual farmer or a hardcore war chief, Clash of Clans offers long-term strategy and community-driven competition.

fields.title: PUBG: Battlegrounds � Survive, Loot, Conquer
fields.summary: PUBG revolutionized the gaming world by introducing the battle royale format on a global scale. Dropping onto vast, realistic maps like Erangel, Miramar, or Vikendi, 100 players must scavenge for weapons, armor, and supplies while staying inside the shrinking play zone. From stealth tactics in buildings to high-speed vehicle chases, every match offers adrenaline, unpredictability, and intense firefights. With its signature "Winner Winner Chicken Dinner" victory message, PUBG challenges reflexes, strategy, and quick decision-making. Over the years, it has evolved with new modes, maps, weather effects, and seasonal events � making it a staple for both casual gamers and professional esports competitors. Whether you're playing solo or with a squad, PUBG delivers the ultimate survival experience where only the smartest and strongest remain.

fields.title: FIFA: The Beautiful Game Goes Digital
fields.summary: FIFA is more than just a football game � it�s the digital heartbeat of global soccer. Developed by EA Sports, FIFA brings the thrill of real-world football into the hands of gamers, with hyper-realistic graphics, official clubs, players, stadiums, and leagues from around the world. From nail-biting penalty shootouts to last-minute goals, every match feels authentic and emotionally charged. The iconic Career Mode lets players manage clubs, scout talent, and build dynasties, while FIFA Ultimate Team (FUT) enables them to craft dream squads with stars like Messi, Mbapp�, and Ronaldo. With each annual release, FIFA introduces improved gameplay mechanics, smarter AI, and immersive presentation. Whether you're a casual fan or an aspiring esports pro, FIFA captures the passion, strategy, and beauty of the world's most beloved sport.
